text: The Macedonia naming dispute was a political dispute between Greece and North Macedonia. The disputed was because of the name “Macedonia”. It was solved in 2019 with the Prespa Agreement when Greek prime minister Alexis Tsipras and Macedonian prime minister Zoran Zaev signed the agreement at Lake Prespa along the border of both countries. ==References== Category:20th-century establishments in Greece Category:1991 establishments in Europe Category:Geographical naming disputes Category:Politics of Greece Category:History of North Macedonia
title: Macedonia naming dispute
